definition: to attack/to inherit/classifier for suits (esp. of funeral robes)

sentences.english: Battleship radar sets permit accurate night bombardment of enemy ships or shore installations.
sentences.chinese: 舰载雷达有助于对敌舰或海防设施进行准确的夜袭。

sentences.english: Her wishful face haunts my dreams like the rain at night.
sentences.chinese: 她热切的面孔如雨夜袭我的梦。

sentences.english: The PLA men seized the city in a sudden night attack.
sentences.chinese: 解放军突然夜袭，占领了那个城市。

sentences.english: He and his partners liked to waylay travelers at night.
sentences.chinese: 他和他的父母喜欢夜袭旅客。

sentences.english: The commander ordered his soldiers to black up for the night attack.
sentences.chinese: 指挥官命令他的士兵脸和手涂黑以进行夜袭。

sentences.english: The first plan, attacking at night, was turned down.
sentences.chinese: 第一个计划是夜袭，被拒绝了。

definition: to seize a camp/to surprise the enemy in bed
to mount a sneak attack/to raid
to annihilate/to wipe out completely/to exterminate
